name: Mum Drinking Water
description:
Mum Drinking Water is the perfect hydration solution for you and your family. Sourced from pristine springs, this water undergoes meticulous filtration to ensure a pure and refreshing taste. Enriched with essential minerals, Mum Drinking Water not only quenches your thirst but also supports overall health and well-being. Available in convenient, easy-to-carry bottles, it’s ideal for any occasion—whether you’re at home, on the go, or enjoying outdoor activities. Trust Mum Drinking Water to keep you and your loved ones hydrated and feeling your best.

name: Super Fresh Drinking Water
description:
Super Fresh Drinking Water is a popular and one of the market leaders among drinking water brands in Bangladesh. It is clear, transparent, free from microorganisms, and refined in seven stages of the purification process De-Iron, Pre-Ozone, De-Odor, Softening, Reverse Osmosis, Ultraviolet Treatment, and Ozonation. Hygiene practice is maintained at every step of our refining process.

name: Aquafina Drinking Water
description:
Aquafina Drinking Water is a purified water product that comes in a 1-liter bottle. It undergoes a rigorous purification process that includes reverse osmosis, ozonation, and carbon filtration, which removes impurities and contaminants to deliver a crisp, clean taste. The bottle is made of lightweight and durable plastic that makes it easy to carry and transport.

name: Spa Drinking Water
description:
Spa is a brand of mineral water from Spa, Belgium, and is owned by the Spadel Group. Spa mineral water has been bottled since the end of the 16th century and is very common in Western Europe and especially in the Benelux countries and Germany but is also exported to other parts of the world.
Spa is a brand of mineral water from Spa, Belgium, and is owned by the Spadel Group. Spa mineral water has been bottled since the end of the 16th century and is very common in Western Europe and especially in the Benelux countries and Germany but is also exported to other parts of the world.

name: Kinley Drinking Water
description:
Highlights: PURE & SAFE: Kinley ensures the safety & purity of their packaged drinking water by undergoing multiple safety processes10-STEP PURIFICATION: Kinley’s packaged water goes through a 10-step purification process that includes disinfection, mineral dozing & other rigorous filtration proceduresADDED MINERALS: Kinley contains added minerals in their packaged drinking waterREFRESH WITH EVERY SIP: Have a sip of Kinley drinking water and feel refreshed while quenching your thirst When it comes to safety and assurance of quality, Kinley is the go-to choice. Kinley contains added minerals, and every drop of this packaged drinking water ensures trust & safety by undergoing an intensive 10-step purification process, ensuring purity. Every drop of Kinley distilled water undergoes disinfection, micron filtration, reverse osmosis, and mineral dozing, besides other rigorous filtration procedures to maintain consistency and purity.

PURE & SAFE: Kinley ensures the safety & purity of their packaged drinking water by undergoing multiple safety processes

Kinley contains added minerals, and every drop of this packaged drinking water ensures trust & safety by undergoing an intensive 10-step purification process, ensuring purity. Every drop of Kinley distilled water undergoes disinfection, micron filtration, reverse osmosis, and mineral dozing, besides other rigorous filtration procedures to maintain consistency and purity.

name: Evian Natural Mineral Water
description:
Evian Natural Mineral Water is globally renowned for its purity, exceptional taste, and pristine source from the French Alps. This 1.5-liter bottle of Evian offers a generous supply of refreshment and hydration, making it a perfect choice for quenching your thirst and staying revitalized throughout the day. Evian's balanced mineral composition and natural taste make it a favorite choice for those who appreciate the essence of pure water. Trust in Evian to provide you with a hydrating experience that embodies the purity of the French Alps.

name: Pureit Classic Germ Kill Kit
description:
Pureit is a revolutionary innovation by Unilever to provide the solution to the need for safe drinking water. It is the world’s one of the most advanced in-home water purifiers and the first of its kind. It is the world’s largest-selling water purifier. Pureit uses advanced “4-Step GermKill Technology” to purify water. First, water passes through microfiber mesh, which removes visible dirt and other material in the water. Second, it passes through the activated carbon trap, which stops all harmful parasites and other objects not visible to the naked eye. In the third step, it passes through the germ-kill processor that kills all the harmful viruses and bacteria. Finally, the water passes through the polisher that removes any chlorine in the water and other unwanted taste or odor-causing elements.
